Interface IWordOnBoardFinder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BadWordOnBoardFinder, GoodWordOnBoardFinder

    public interface IWordOnBoardFinder
    Interface for word finders.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<BoardCell> cellsForWord(BoggleBoard board, java.lang.String word)
      Return a list of cells on the given board such that the i-th element of the list corresponds to the i-th character of the string as found on the board.

    • Method Detail

      • cellsForWord

        java.util.List<BoardCell> cellsForWord(BoggleBoard board,
                                       java.lang.String word)
        Return a list of cells on the given board such that the i-th element of the list corresponds to the i-th character of the string as found on the board. Returns an empty list if the word cannot be found on the board.
        Parameters:
        board - is searched for the given word
        word - is being searched for on the board
        Returns:
        list of cells on the supplied board that correspond to the word, an empty list should be returned if the word cannot be found on the board
